survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the financial management practices and challenges faced by freelancers, including budgeting, tax preparation, and savings strategies.

questions.question_text: How do you primarily manage your freelance income?
questions.client_notes: Ensure options cover common tools freelancers use for financial management.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice question. Use radio buttons for selection.

script.question_text: How do you primarily manage your freelance income?

questions.question_text: What are your biggest challenges with managing freelance finances? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture overlapping challenges.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice question. Use checkboxes for selection.

script.question_text: What are your biggest challenges with managing freelance finances? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you set aside money for taxes?
answer_options: I don't set aside money for taxes
questions.client_notes: This question helps gauge tax planning habits among freelancers.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice question. Use radio buttons for selection.

script.question_text: How often do you set aside money for taxes?
answer_options: I don't set aside money for taxes

questions.question_text: What tools or resources do you use for tax preparation?
questions.client_notes: Include common tax preparation tools freelancers might use.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice question. Use checkboxes for selection.

script.question_text: What tools or resources do you use for tax preparation?

questions.question_text: Describe any additional financial challenges you face as a freelancer that were not listed above.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture unique financial challenges.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text question. Provide a text input field.
